Simple Linear Regression

```{r}
#| echo: false
attach(cars)
```

First principles

```{r}
X <-  matrix(data = cbind(rep(1, 50) ,cars$speed), nrow = 50, ncol = 2)
Y <-  cars$dist

betas = (solve(t(X)%*%X))%*%(t(X)%*%Y)
```

Using R package

```{r}

mod <- lm(Y~X)
summary(mod)
```
